template_body.description: Structure containing the template body (max size: 51,200 bytes).

template_url.description: Location of a file containing the template body (max size: 460,800 bytes).

disable_rollback.description: Set to true to disable rollback of the stack if stack creation failed.

notification_arns.description: A list of SNS topic ARNs to publish stack related events.

on_failure.description: Action to be taken if stack creation fails. This must be

parameters.description: A map of Parameter structures that specify input parameters for the stack.

policy_body.description: Structure containing the stack policy body.

policy_url.description: Location of a file containing the stack policy.

tags.description: A list of tags to associate with this stack.

iam_role_arn.description: The ARN of an IAM role that AWS CloudFormation assumes to create the stack. If you don't specify a value, AWS CloudFormation uses the role that was previously associated with the stack. If no role is available, AWS CloudFormation uses a temporary session that is generated from your user credentials.

timeout_in_minutes.description: The amount of time that can pass before the stack status becomes `CREATE_FAILED`.

id.description: A unique identifier of the stack.

outputs.description: A map of outputs from the stack.
